## Deliverables

- [ ] Schematic (.sch and .sym files)
- [ ] Testbench and simulation results
- [ ] CACE characterization results
- [ ] Layout (DRC/LVS clean)
- [ ] Block README.md with documentation
- [ ] Pull Request submitted

## Resources

- [Getting Started Guide](../docs/GETTING_STARTED.md)
- [Student Workflow](../docs/STUDENT_WORKFLOW.md)
- [Verification Plan](../docs/VERIFICATION_PLAN.md)
- Example: `examples/<block>/`

## Timeline

- **Week 1-2**: Schematic design and initial simulation
- **Week 3**: Complete functional verification and corner analysis
- **Week 4**: Characterization with CACE
- **Week 5**: Layout design
- **Week 6**: DRC/LVS cleanup and post-layout verification
- **Week 7**: Documentation and PR submission

- [ ] None (can start immediately)
- [ ] Block: _____ (need for testing)

This block is required by:
- [ ] Block: _____

## Questions and Discussion

Post any questions or discussion points as comments below.

## Progress Updates

Please provide weekly updates in the comments with:
- What was accomplished
- Current status
- Any blockers or issues
- Next steps

**Instructors**: Please update group members, assign this issue, and add appropriate labels.
